name: Level Info
description: A simple and customizable mod that displays information about the level you are on in Geometry Dash

text-size.name: Text size
text-size.description: Define the size of the text that will be displayed on a level's page

text-opacity.name: Text opacity
text-opacity.description: Set the opacity of the text that will be displayed on a level's page

text-color.name: Text color
text-color.description: Set the color of the text that will be displayed on a level's page

show-requested-stars.name: Requested Stars
show-requested-stars.description: Display the difficulty in stars/moons requested by the creator

show-featured-rank.name: Featured Rank
show-featured-rank.description: Display the featured rank of a level

show-object-count.name: Object Count
show-object-count.description: Display the amount of objects in a level (may be inaccurate for levels with more than 65535 objects)

show-two-player-mode.name: 2-Player mode
show-two-player-mode.description: Indicate if the level is using 2-player mode

show-game-version.name: Game Version
show-game-version.description: Indicate the version of the game in which the level was posted/updated

show-level-version.name: Level Version
show-level-version.description: Display the current version of a level (or the amount of updates a level received)

show-original-level-id.name: Original Level
show-original-level-id.description: Display the original level ID of a copied level

show-editor-time.name: Editor Time
show-editor-time.description: Show how much time the creator(s) of a level spent in the editor

show-editor-time-copies.name: Editor Time (+copies)
show-editor-time-copies.description: Show how much time the creator(s) of a level spent in the editorr (including previous copies)

show-total-attempts.name: Total Attempts
show-total-attempts.description: Indicate how many attempts you spent on a level

show-total-jumps.name: Total Jumps
show-total-jumps.description: Show your total amount of jumps in a level

show-clicks.name: Total Clicks (best attempt)
show-clicks.description: Show how many times you clicked on your best attempt on a level

show-attempt-time.name: Best time
show-attempt-time.description: Show your best time on a level
